title: 3D Column Asset
subtitle: Personal Work
desc: For this model, I meticulously crafted a classical Roman Corinthian column, paying special attention to the intricate leaf detailing typical of the style. I aimed to achieve a polished white marble appearance, enhancing realism and usability across different projects. The model is optimized and exported in multiple formats—OBJ, GLB, glTF, and USDZ—ensuring versatility for architectural visualization, games, or AR/VR use. Additionally, I kept the resolution high (2K) for crisp textures while maintaining efficient geometry for smooth performance.
